Name: Wisecrack Fizz
Ingredients: 45 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and serve with straws.
Review: Light, balanced and refreshing. The pisco character shines through.
History: Created in 2007 by Matt Gee at Milk & Honey, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Wisecrack Fizz contains 158 calories
